theRose:Workout.NAME: Workout
theRose:Workout.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Heal !theRose:SecondMagic! HP. NL Exhaust.

theRose:FlipperFlap.NAME: Flipper Flap
theRose:FlipperFlap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. NL Gain !theRose:SecondMagic! Flight. NL Exhaust.

theRose:TemperTantrum.NAME: Temper Tantrum
theRose:TemperTantrum.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, add !M! Flipper Flap into your hand.

theRose:BeakDive.NAME: Beak Dive
theRose:BeakDive.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played when in Flight. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Lose all Flight.

theRose:Peck.NAME: Peck
theRose:Peck.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your current Flight. Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL If in Flight, apply !theRose:SecondMagic! Weak.

theRose:UberDishes.NAME: UberDishes
theRose:UberDishes.DESCRIPTION: Create !M! random Food items in your draw pile.
theRose:UberDishes.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Create !M! random Upgraded Food items in your draw pile.

theRose:EnergyDrink.NAME: Energy Drink
theRose:EnergyDrink.DESCRIPTION: Next turn gain 1 [E]. Gain !theRose:SecondMagic! Flight. NL Exhaust.

theRose:Donut.NAME: Donut
theRose:Donut.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 Card. Lose !theRose:SecondMagic! Flight. NL Exhaust.

theRose:FriedChicken.NAME: Fried Chicken
theRose:FriedChicken.DESCRIPTION: Gain !theRose:SecondMagic! Strength. At the end of this turn, lose !theRose:SecondMagic! Strength. NL Exhaust.

theRose:Sushi.NAME: Sushi
theRose:Sushi.DESCRIPTION: Gain !theRose:SecondMagic! Dexterity. At the end of this turn, lose !theRose:SecondMagic! Dexterity. NL Exhaust.

theRose:Hamburger.NAME: Hamburger
theRose:Hamburger.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. This cards counts as !M! Food items. NL Exhaust.

theRose:HungryForm.NAME: Hungry Form
theRose:HungryForm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Eat !M! random Food items. Ethereal.

theRose:Reorder.NAME: Reorder
theRose:Reorder.DESCRIPTION: Play all Exhausted Food items to your hand. NL Exhaust.

theRose:BellyBump.NAME: Belly Bump
theRose:BellyBump.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !theRose:SecondMagic! times your Food Eaten counter. Halve the counter.

theRose:LunchLadyRose.NAME: Lunch Lady Rose
theRose:LunchLadyRose.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Passivity. Apply a random Food item.

theRose:ChefRose.NAME: Chef Rose
theRose:ChefRose.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Create a random Food item in your hand.
theRose:ChefRose.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Create a random Upgraded Food item to your hand.

theRose:TakesiesBacksies.NAME: Takesies Backsies
theRose:TakesiesBacksies.DESCRIPTION: For every !M! Passivity, reduce Passivity by !M!, deal !D! damage, and Eat a random Food item.

theRose:HeadPat.NAME: Head Pat
theRose:HeadPat.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Passivity. NL Add a copy of this card to your discard pile.

theRose:StayStill.NAME: Play Dead
theRose:StayStill.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if no Attack was played this turn. Apply !M! Passivity to all enemies. End your turn.

theRose:Sprint.NAME: Sprint
theRose:Sprint.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if no Food item was played this turn. NL Draw !M! Cards. NL Lose all Flight.

theRose:EarlyBird.NAME: Early Bird
theRose:EarlyBird.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Flight. Deal damage equal to your current Flight. Add a random Food item to your hand.
theRose:EarlyBird.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Flight. Deal damage equal to your current Flight. Add !theRose:SecondMagic! random Food items to your hand.

theRose:Chat.NAME: Chat
theRose:Chat.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Passivity. If an enemy does not intend to attack, apply an extra !theRose:SecondMagic! Passivity.

theRose:AFishADay.NAME: Funky Fish
theRose:AFishADay.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Artifact. At the start of your next turn, lose !M! Artifact. NL Exhaust.

theRose:FoodFight.NAME: Food Fight!
theRose:FoodFight.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Eat, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

theRose:Squish.NAME: Squish
theRose:Squish.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to 50% of your current HP. NL Exhaust.
theRose:Squish.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to 75% of your current HP. NL Exhaust.

theRose:TriplerFlap.NAME: Tripler Flap
theRose:TriplerFlap.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! Flipper Flap to your hand.
theRose:TriplerFlap.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add !M! Upgraded Flipper Flap to your hand.

theRose:FollowUpFlap.NAME: Follow-Up Flap
theRose:FollowUpFlap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. Add !theRose:SecondMagic! Flipper Flap to your hand.
theRose:FollowUpFlap.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. Add !theRose:SecondMagic! Upgraded Flipper Flap to your hand.

theRose:FlapFrenzy.NAME: Flap Frenzy
theRose:FlapFrenzy.DESCRIPTION: Play a Flipper Flap for each 0-cost card played this combat. NL Exhaust.
theRose:FlapFrenzy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Play an Upgraded Flipper Flap for each 0-cost card played this combat. NL Exhaust.

theRose:FluffyFurFlex.NAME: Fur Flex
theRose:FluffyFurFlex.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Gain !M! Thorns. At the start of your next turn, lose !M! Thorns.

theRose:RefrigeratorRaid.NAME: Refrigerator Raid!
theRose:RefrigeratorRaid.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Intangible. Fill your hand with Food items. Exhaust.
theRose:RefrigeratorRaid.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Intangible. Fill your hand with Upgraded Food items. Exhaust.

theRose:Bulking.NAME: Bulking
theRose:Bulking.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Eat this turn, gain !theRose:SecondMagic! Block. Eat !M! random Food item.

theRose:FoodFit.NAME: Food Fit
theRose:FoodFit.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. If you have not eaten this combat, deal an extra !M! damage.

theRose:BeakSmash.NAME: Beak Smash!
theRose:BeakSmash.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !M! times your current Flight. NL Lose all Flight.

theRose:MidflightSnack.NAME: Midflight Snack
theRose:MidflightSnack.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !theRose:SecondMagic! times your current Flight. NL Eat !M! random Food items. NL Lose all Flight.
theRose:MidflightSnack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !theRose:SecondMagic! times your current Flight. NL Eat !M! random Upgraded Food items. NL Lose all Flight.

theRose:PermanentChub.NAME: Big Chubster
theRose:PermanentChub.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to the number of Food items eaten this game. Exhaust.

theRose:ShinyBeakAndMe.NAME: Blinding Beak!
theRose:ShinyBeakAndMe.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Passivity and !theRose:SecondMagic! Weak to all enemies.

theRose:LucidDream.NAME: Lucid Dream
theRose:LucidDream.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Flight. At the end of your turn, lose !M! Flight. NL Draw 1 card.

theRose:GrannyKiss.NAME: Granny Kiss!
theRose:GrannyKiss.DESCRIPTION: Double the enemy's Passivity. NL Exhaust.
theRose:GrannyKiss.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Triple the enemy's Passivity. NL Exhaust.

theRose:NappyTime.NAME: Nappy Time!
theRose:NappyTime.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Gain !M! Plated Armor. NL End your turn.

theRose:Angy.NAME: Angy!
theRose:Angy.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. If you took damage last turn, gain !M! Strength.

theRose:Hibernate.NAME: Hibernate
theRose:Hibernate.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Eat !M! random Food items. Next turn, gain 1 [E]. NL Lose all energy.

theRose:Thunder.NAME: Thunder
theRose:Thunder.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Whenever you draw this card, deal !D! damage to a random enemy, apply !M! Vulnerable, and Draw !theRose:SecondMagic! card.

theRose:WitchRose.NAME: Witch Rose
theRose:WitchRose.DESCRIPTION: Create !M! Thunder in your discard pile. NL Exhaust.

theRose:Overstory.NAME: Overstory
theRose:Overstory.DESCRIPTION: Create a random Food item in your hand. Choose one: Create an Exhaust Ethereal Beak Dive, Chat, or Play Dead in your hand. NL Exhaust.
theRose:Overstory.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Create a random Food item in your hand. Choose one: Create an Upgraded Exhaust Ethereal Beak Dive, Chat, or Play Dead in your hand. NL Exhaust.

theRose:TreadmillTreat.NAME: Treadmill Treat
theRose:TreadmillTreat.DESCRIPTION: Draw and discard the top !M! cards in your draw pile. If a card is 0-cost, play it instead.

theRose:StealthRose.NAME: Stealth Rose
theRose:StealthRose.DESCRIPTION: Gain 5 Block. Draw !M! card. This is unaffected by any Buff or Debuff.
theRose:StealthRose.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 8 Block. Draw !M! card. This is unaffected by any Buff or Debuff.

theRose:DivaRose.NAME: Diva Rose
theRose:DivaRose.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Passivity. When this enemy flees, apply its Passivity to all enemies. NL Exahust.

theRose:Munch.NAME: Munch
theRose:Munch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If Fatal, raise your Max Hp by !M!. NL Exhaust.

theRose:PickyEater.NAME: Picky Eater
theRose:PickyEater.DESCRIPTION: Choose one: Create a Donut, Energy Drink, Fried Chicken, Hamburger, or Sushi, in your hand.
theRose:PickyEater.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose one: Create an Upgraded Donut, Energy Drink, Fried Chicken, Hamburger, or Sushi, in your hand.

theRose:AgentRose.NAME: Agent Rose
theRose:AgentRose.DESCRIPTION: Create !M! Bomb in your discard pile. Exhaust.
theRose:AgentRose.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Create !M! Upgraded Bomb in your discard pile. NL Exhaust.

theRose:Bomb.NAME: Agent Rose's Bomb
theRose:Bomb.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw this card, reduce its cost by !M!. Create 1 Mission Accomplished in your hand. Exhaust.

theRose:MissionAccomplished.NAME: Mission Accomplished.
theRose:MissionAccomplished.DESCRIPTION: Agent Rose has fulfilled her assigned duties. NL Deal !D! to all enemies. Gain !M! Gold. Exhaust.

theRose:Bloated.NAME: Bloated
theRose:Bloated.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain !B! Block. If a Food item was eaten this turn, deal and gain !M! extra, and Draw 1 card.

theRose:BabyRose.NAME: Baby Rose
theRose:BabyRose.DESCRIPTION: Gain !theRose:SecondMagic! Flipped Off. Choose one: Create a Donut, Energy Drink, Fried Chicken, Hamburger, or Sushi, in your hand.
theRose:BabyRose.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !theRose:SecondMagic! Flipped Off. Choose one: Create an Upgraded Donut, Energy Drink, Fried Chicken, Hamburger, or Sushi, in your hand.

theRose:NinjaRose.NAME: Ninja Rose
theRose:NinjaRose.DESCRIPTION: Choose one: Create any "Rose" card in your hand. NL Ethereal. NL Exhaust.
theRose:NinjaRose.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose one: Create any Upgraded "Rose" card in your hand. NL Ethereal. NL Exhaust.

theRose:BigBlubber.NAME: Big Blubber
theRose:BigBlubber.DESCRIPTION: Increase your Food Eaten counter by !M!. Gain Block equal to your Food Eaten counter.

theRose:FoodComa.NAME: Food Coma
theRose:FoodComa.DESCRIPTION: Increase your Food Eaten counter by !M!. Deal damage equal to your Food Eaten counter to all enemies. End your turn.

theRose:SnackAttack.NAME: Snack Attack
theRose:SnackAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to 2 times your Food Eaten counter. If you've eaten over !theRose:SecondMagic! Food items this game, deal an extra !M! damage.

theRose:FightOrFlightOrDelight.NAME: Fight or Flight or Delight
theRose:FightOrFlightOrDelight.DESCRIPTION: Choose one: Deal !D! damage, Gain !M! Flight, or increase your Food Eaten counter by !theRose:SecondMagic!.

theRose:AngelRose.NAME: Angel Rose
theRose:AngelRose.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you have defeated all previous enemies with Passivity. ?

theRose:PeacefulPicnic.NAME: Peaceful Picnic
theRose:PeacefulPicnic.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Passivity to all enemies. Create 1 random Food item for every 1 enemy.

theRose:De-FlightfulFlap.NAME: De-Flightful Flap
theRose:De-FlightfulFlap.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Flight for all your cards containing "Flap". Deal !M! damage for every 1 Flight.

theRose:Betray.NAME: Betray
theRose:Betray.DESCRIPTION: Instantly kill any non-boss, non-elite enemy that has at least 1 stack of Passivity. Remove this card from your deck.

theRose:Reunion.NAME: Reunion
theRose:Reunion.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy is bird-like, they flee. Ethereal.

theRose:Regurgitate.NAME: Regurgitate
theRose:Regurgitate.DESCRIPTION: For every !M! Food Eaten, lose !M! Food Eaten, deal !D! damage, and create a random Food item in your hand.

theRose:FlyBy.NAME: Fly-By
theRose:FlyBy.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !M! times your current Flight to all enemies.

theRose:BodySlam.NAME: Body Slam
theRose:BodySlam.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to 1/2 of your current HP. Lose HP equal to 1/4 of your current HP.

theRose:Chomp.NAME: Chomp
theRose:Chomp.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to 10% (15%) of the enemy's max health. Heal HP equal to half the unblocked damage. Exhaust.

theRose:PenguPalace.NAME: Pengu Palace
theRose:PenguPalace.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage and gain Block equal to !M! times the number of enemies Befriended.

theRose:FlyHigher.NAME: Fly Higher!
theRose:FlyHigher.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Flight. Flight reduces Attack damage taken by 75% this turn. Remove all Block. You cannot gain Block this turn.

theRose:FoodRush.NAME: Food Rush
theRose:FoodRush.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you consume a Food item, have your next Attack deal !M! additional damage.

theRose:Slap.NAME: Slap
theRose:Slap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. This card's damage is lowered by !M! this combat.

theRose:OutOfSight.NAME: Out Of Sight
theRose:OutOfSight.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Flight, apply !M! Weak to a random enemy.

theRose:BubbleButt.NAME: Bubble Butt
theRose:BubbleButt.DESCRIPTION: Reduce damage taken by !M! for the rest of this combat.

theRose:BellySlide.NAME: Belly Slide
theRose:BellySlide.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. Apply Vulnerable to all enemies.

theRose:FullOfFlap.NAME: Full Of Flap
theRose:FullOfFlap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. Deals an additional !theRose:SecondMagic! damage for all your cards containing "Flap"

theRose:FlexedUpFlap.NAME: Flexed Up Flap
theRose:FlexedUpFlap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. Gain !theRose:SecondMagic! Strength. At the end of your turn, lose !theRose:SecondMagic! Strength.

theRose:FlipperFlexer.NAME: Flipper Flexer
theRose:FlipperFlexer.DESCRIPTION: All cards containing "Flap" deal !M! more damage.

theRose:TestBuff.NAME: Test Buff
theRose:TestBuff.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. After you play a card, lose !M! Strength.

theRose:PenguinBackRide.NAME: Penguin Back Ride
theRose:PenguinBackRide.DESCRIPTION: Apply Passivity equal to !M! times your Flight. Lose all Flight.

theRose:Boost.NAME: Boost
theRose:Boost.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played in Flight. Draw 3 cards.

theRose:Roost.NAME: Roost
theRose:Roost.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played in Flight. Gain !B! Block. End your turn.

theRose:GustOfWind.NAME: Gust Of Wind
theRose:GustOfWind.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played in Flight. Deal !D! damage for every 1 Flight.
